name: filter_qc
title: ENCODE TF Chip-seq Mapped Read Filter and QC
summary: Take a raw bam file of mapped reads, filter, calculate QC metrics

inputSpec.name: paired_end
inputSpec.label: True if the bam was derived from paired-end reads.

inputSpec.name: samtools_params
inputSpec.label: Command-line parameters to samtools common to both single- and paired-end data

outputSpec.name: paired_end
outputSpec.label: True if the bam was derived from paired-end reads.

outputSpec.name: n_reads_input
outputSpec.label: Total number of reads in the input

outputSpec.name: picard_read_pairs_examined
outputSpec.label: Number of read pairs passed to picard (PE sequencing)

outputSpec.name: picard_unpaired_reads_examined
outputSpec.label: Number of SE reads passed to picard (SE sequencing)

outputSpec.name: picard_read_pair_duplicates
outputSpec.label: Number of duplicate read pairs from picard (PE sequencing)

outputSpec.name: picard_unpaired_read_duplicates
outputSpec.label: Number of SE duplicate reads from picard (SE sequencing)

outputSpec.name: useable_fragments
outputSpec.label: Number of DNA fragments (SE reads or PE pairs) surviving all filters

outputSpec.name: scrubbed_unfiltered_bam
outputSpec.label: Mapped reads scrubbed of sequence information.

outputSpec.name: scrubbed_filtered_bam
outputSpec.label: Filtered mapped reads scrubbed of sequence information.
